### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title {#title}
Paediatric Data - Stream 1

#### Reference Number {#reference}
WS3236296480-Doc4296392924

#### Amendment Number {#amendment}
1 (released on 06 Dec, 2023)

#### Tender Closing Date {#tenderclosingdate}
20 Dec 2023, 14:00:00

#### Tender Status {#tenderstatus}
Expired (Awarded)

#### Procurement Details
* Category: Goods and Services
* Type: Request for Proposal
* Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Cost-per-Point
* Trade Agreements: WTO GPA, CPTPP, and CFTA

#### Contract Information
* Expected Contract Start Date: 02 Oct 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 30 Jun 2027
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

#### Government Entity Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: Phase III, Place du Portage, 11 Laurier St, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Tender Description {#tenderdescription}
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) requires a contractor to provide information and data on the paediatric population at multiple hospital sites in Canada for Stream 1. The contract period includes two years with the option to extend for up to five additional years. The tender requires security measures and proof of liability insurance.

#### Contact Information
* Name: Diane Reynolds (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: diane.reynolds@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Association: Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)

#### Attachments {#attachments}
Not included with the tender notice.
